# el-textarea



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                          | Type                                             | Default      |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------ |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | Disabled state                       | `boolean`                                        | `false`      |
| `error`     | `error`      | Error text                           | `string`                                         | `undefined`  |
| `maxLength` | `max-length` | Max length for the value             | `number`                                         | `undefined`  |
| `readonly`  | `readonly`   | Readonly state                       | `boolean`                                        | `false`      |
| `resize`    | `resize`     | Whether the textarea is resizable    | `"both" \| "horizontal" \| "none" \| "vertical"` | `'vertical'` |
| `rows`      | `rows`       | Number of rows                       | `number`                                         | `3`          |
| `size`      | `size`       | Visual size                          | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                           | `'md'`       |
| `value`     | `value`      | Current value (uncontrolled for now) | `string`                                         | `undefined`  |

| Event      | Description | Type                  |
| ---------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `elChange` |             | `CustomEvent<string>` |
